description.multi: Multilingual and multi-styles templates for SPIP 1.9.1. _ You will find information about this template under _ [Squelettes ALTERNATIVES->http://www.stages.alternatives.ca/article73.html] [fr] Jeu de squelettes multilingue et multi-styles pour SPIP 1.9.1. _ Vous trouverez toutes les informations concernant ce jeu de squelettes sur _ [Squelettes ALTERNATIVES->http://www.stages.alternatives.ca/article73.html]
